generator.title: NPC Generator
generator.description1: This generator creates fully-editable Non-Player Characters (NPCs) for Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition.
generator.description2: Click on the "cog" icon at the bottom-right of each character's Stat Block to edit it or add it to your collection. You can find more Races and Classes in Community Creations, or you can use the editor to make your own.
generator.formModeDescription: Choose the most appropriate options for your adventure and generate a random character.
generator.promptModeDescription: Type keywords like "human", "barbarian" or "cr 5" to generate a random character of that type.

login.failed: Login failed. Check your credentials try again.
login.notYetActivated: Your account has not been activated yet. Check your email for the activation link, or click on the link below to resend it.
login.greetings1: Ah, my old nemesis. I see you've finally crawled out of your hole.
login.greetings2: Greetings, fellow genius. I trust you have a plan worthy of our intellects.
login.greetings3: Well, well, well. If it isn't the most notorious villain in the world. How do you do?
login.greetings4: Hello, my dear friend. I'm so glad you could join me for this littleâ€¦ experiment.
login.greetings6: Good day, sir. I must say, you look rather dashing in that suit. Did you make it yourself?
login.greetings7: Welcome, welcome. I've been expecting you. Please, make yourself comfortable.
login.greetings8: How nice to see you again...
login.greetings9: Greetings, my fellow genius. I trust you have been busy with your nefarious schemes.
login.greetings10: Ah, the infamous master of mayhem. It is an honor to have you back in my lair. I have admired your work from afar.
login.greetings11: Well, well, well. Look who decided to show up. The most feared villain in the world. Or so you claim.
login.greetings12: Hello, old friend. It has been a long time since we last crossed paths. How have you been keeping yourself entertained?
login.greetings13: Salutations, esteemed colleague. I am delighted to see you again. I hope you are ready for some fun and chaos.
login.greetings14: Bonjour, mon ami. You look ravishing as always. Have you come to join me in my latest conquest?
login.greetings15: Hail, mighty lord of darkness. I bow before your greatness. I am here to offer you my loyalty and service.

registration.emailAlreadyExists: That email already exists in our database! Check the links below to log in or reset your password.
registration.unknownError: Unknown error. Check if the format of your credentials is correct, or try again later.
registration.successMessage: We sent an email to {email} with a link to activate your account. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

reactivation.title: Account reactivation
reactivation.message: Insert your email address and we'll send you a link to activate your account and set up a new password.
